member.name: MSV1_0_PROFILE_TYPE
member.summary: The MSV1_0_PROFILE_BUFFER_TYPE enumeration lists the kind of logon profile returned.

member.name: MSV1_0_PROFILE_TYPE.MsV1_0InteractiveProfile
member.summary: The profile describes an interactive logon session.

member.name: MSV1_0_PROFILE_TYPE.MsV1_0Lm20LogonProfile
member.summary: The profile describes a network logon session.

member.name: MSV1_0_PROFILE_TYPE.MsV1_0SmartCardProfile
member.summary: The profile describes a smart card logon session.
